title: Education Center
desc: A mobile-first learning app UI focused on simplicity and engagement.
Designed key flows including onboarding, course browsing, and progress tracking.
Used a clean color palette and friendly visuals to enhance user experience.

title: Travel Guy
desc: Landing page concept for a modern travel and tourism website.
Focused on visual storytelling using high-quality imagery and vibrant layout.
Designed sections for featured destinations, packages, and user testimonials.

title: Instagram for Vision Pro
desc: Concept UI for Instagram on Apple Vision Pro.
Adapted the experience to spatial interfaces and 3D interactions.
Emphasized gesture-based navigation and immersive content viewing.

title: EzyDB
desc: A lightweight, file-based NoSQL database system built with Python.
Designed for developers who need quick and easy data storage without server setup.
Supports basic CRUD operations and flexible JSON-style schema.

title: DarkEST
desc: A visually soothing dark theme for Visual Studio Code.
Crafted to reduce eye strain during long development sessions.
Balances deep blacks and muted colors for readability and elegance.

title: Pip Creator
desc: CLI tool to help developers quickly generate and publish Python packages.
Automates setup file creation, versioning, and structure generation.
Great for beginners who want to publish tools to PyPI with ease.

title: Markdown Editor
desc: A minimal markdown editor that renders live preview as you type.
Clean UI for distraction-free writing and formatting.
Built using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
